successes.record_retrieved: The latest record has been successfully pulled from the magnetometer.

errors.record_exists: The latest magnetometer record already exists in the database.
errors.record_missing: The magnetometer record set to be retrieved today appears to be missing or inaccessible.
errors.magnetometer_failure: Failure attempting to retrieve data from the magnetometer.
errors.logger_failure: The system logging functionality has failed.
errors.database_failure: A connection to the database cannot be established.
errors.locale_json_failure: The locale JSON is corrupted or malformed.
errors.locale_json_missing: The locale JSON is missing or inaccessible.
errors.override_failure: Magnetometer data could not be manually retrieved.
errors.renderer_failure: The templating system failured to render.
errors.general: An error has occurred. Since this is production mode, the info is hidden, just let the dev know!
errors.javascript: This program requires JavaScript enabled to run.

debugger.debugInfo: Because the program is running in debug mode, extra information on retrieved data is available. Please make sure this mode is disabled before going into production!

home.title: Dashboard
home.subtitle: Required Declaration:
home.introduction: The information provided on this and other pages by me, Oliver Earl (ole4@aber.ac.uk), is under my own personal responsibility and not that of the Aberystwyth University. Similarly, any opinions expressed are my own and are in no way to be taken as those of Aberystwyth University.
home.welshText: The Welsh used in this program is not currently accurate, as machine translations are currently used as placeholders.

about.title: About
about.p1: Borealis is a web application that retrieves data from the FGM-3 magnetometer stored on Frongoch Farm and makes it available here for graphical or tabular viewing or export as JSON or XML.
about.p2: Bootstrap, jQuery, Chart.js, Composer, Logger, Twig, Sgrabaum/SMB (Icewind/SMB), PHPUnit, PHPMD
about.p3: Magnetometer retrieval may happen repeatedly, or not at all. Extremely large amounts of data may refuse to be exported. API might have trouble understanding POST requests. (Try GET in the meantime.)
about.p4: Amateur Radio / Radio and Internet Data (ESA) Data Retrieval.

magnetometer.title: Magnetometer
magnetometer.description: Data entries returned from the magnetometer can be viewed here and sent to either the Graphing Tool, or displayed as tabular data. As there might be times where choosing multiple of the same entry is desired, this functionality is left intact. The magnetometer takes hundreds of readings each day, so this tool provides an average for both value and temperature from that day to compensate for such a large set of data. Dramatic shifts in magnetosphere strength or temperature of the device caused by solar event, harsh weather, or otherwise should nevertheless still be reflected within the data.
magnetometer.changeEntries: Dynamic entries are currently unimplemented. If you want to change the number of entries, you can do so from the Settings page.
